trait.name: Disabled
trait.text: While Primus' head and torso are disabled it cannot use innate spellcasting, make an energy blast attack, and it can only make two re-order attacks when taking the multiattack action.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Primus makes two dark hand slam attacks and two rainbow hand slam attacks.

action.name: Dark Hand Slam
action.text: Melee weapon attack: +29 to hit, reach 150 ft., one target. Hit: 146 (27d8 + 25) bludgeoning damage and the creature must make a DC 29 Charisma saving throw or be banished to Acheron.

action.name: Rainbow Hand Slam
action.text: Melee weapon attack: +29 to hit, reach 150 ft., one target. Hit: 117 )21d8 + 23) bludgeoning damage and the creature must make a DC 29 Charisma saving throw or be banished to Arcadia.
